org.sindice.rdfcommons.beanmapper
Interface SerializationSupport<T>

All Known Subinterfaces:
CriteriaSerializer<T>, SerializationContext, Serializer<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
ArraySerializer, BaseSerializer, BeanSerializer, CollectionSerializer, EnumSerializer, MapSerializer, PrimitiveSerializer, StaticBeanSerializer, StaticCollectionSerializer, StaticMapSerializer
public interface SerializationSupport<T>

Defines any method to provide serialization support.

Version:
$Id: SerializationSupport.java 24 2010-12-01 23:47:33Z michele.mostarda $
Author:
Michele Mostarda ( mostarda@fbk.eu )

Method Summary
 Identifier serialize(SerializationContext context, T object, Annotation[] annotations, TripleSet buffer)
          Serializes the given object in a triple set.
 

Method Detail

serialize

Identifier serialize(SerializationContext context,
                     T object,
                     Annotation[] annotations,
                     TripleSet buffer)
                     throws SerializationException
Serializes the given object in a triple set.

Parameters:
context - context used to serialize the T object.
object - target object.
annotations - annotations associated to the object.
buffer - triple set buffer used to store triples representing the serialization result.
Returns:
the result of serialization, if a complex object has been serialized, the identifier of such serialization.
Throws:
SerializationException - if something went wrong during the serialization process.
